{"@context":"https:\/\/schema.org\/","@type":"BlogPosting","author":{"@type":"Organization","name":"\u307f\u3093\u30ec\u30dd","url":"https:\/\/min-repo.com\/"},"dateModified":"2026-01-25T11:23:10+09:00","datePublished":"2026-01-25T11:23:10+09:00","headline":"1\/24(\u571f) \u30de\u30eb\u30cf\u30f3\u3064\u304f\u3070\u5e97 \u30b9\u30ed\u30c3\u30c8\u30c7\u30fc\u30bf\u8a73\u7d30","image":"https:\/\/min-repo.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2019\/08\/minrepo_square.png","description":"1\/24(\u571f) \u30de\u30eb\u30cf\u30f3\u3064\u304f\u3070\u5e97\u306e\u30b9\u30ed\u30c3\u30c8\u30c7\u30fc\u30bf\u8a73\u7d30"}
--- SCRIPT INDEX [25] ---

	$(document).ready(function() {
		var history_ids = $.cookie('history_ids');
		if( !history_ids ) {
			history_ids = "";
		}
		var history_ids_arr = history_ids.split(',');
		var post_id = String(2879243);
		history_ids_arr = history_ids_arr.filter(function(a) {
			return a !== post_id;
		});
		history_ids_arr.unshift(post_id);
		var new_history_ids_arr = [];
		$.each(history_ids_arr,function(index,val){
			new_history_ids_arr.push(val);
			if( index >= 49 ) {
				return false;
			}
		});
		history_ids = new_history_ids_arr.join(',');
		$.removeCookie('history_ids', { path: "/" });
		$.cookie('history_ids', history_ids, { path: "/", expires: 3650, domain: ".min-repo.com" });
		var fab_ids = $.cookie('fab_ids');
		if( fab_ids ){
			var fab_ids_arr = fab_ids.split(',');
			if (fab_ids_arr.indexOf(post_id) !== -1) {
				$('.fab-btn').addClass('favorited');
			}
		}
				$.cookie('_d2', '4vDbKqdbuS497aZk+ADUXw==', { path: "/", expires: 60, domain: ".min-repo.com" });
						$.cookie('_d_a2', 'wBQIKNsYGXDu2/lxGdh3S6oY4A1dE64k+gkiIbaKstM=', { path: "/", expires: 60, domain: ".min-repo.com" });
			});
	$('.fab-btn').on('click',function(){
		var fab_ids = $.cookie('fab_ids');
		if( !fab_ids ) {
			fab_ids = "";
		}
		var fab_ids_arr = fab_ids.split(',');
		var post_id = String($(this).data('hallid'));
		if ( $.inArray( post_id, fab_ids_arr ) !== -1 ) {
			fab_ids_arr = fab_ids_arr.filter(function(a) {
				return a !== post_id;
			});
			$('[data-hallid="'+post_id+'"]').removeClass('favorited');
		} else {
			fab_ids_arr.unshift(post_id);
			$('[data-hallid="'+post_id+'"]').addClass('favorited');
		}
		fab_ids = fab_ids_arr.join(',');
		$.removeCookie('fab_ids', { path: "/" });
		$.cookie('fab_ids', fab_ids, { path: "/", expires: 3650, domain: ".min-repo.com" });
	});
